name: DR0014

company_info.description: Elexion Automotive designs and manufactures premium and mid-range electric vehicles tailored for the North American market. With a focus on sustainability, user-centric technology, and cross-border compliance, Elexion aims to accelerate the transition to zero-emission transportation.
company_info.market_position: Elexion is an emerging force in the North American EV market, offering affordable and high-performance electric vehicles with regulatory-first design and localized production.
company_info.name: Elexion Automotive

dr_question: Can we leverage AI-enhanced battery management to improve EV battery lifespan by 15%?

persona.justification: As an advanced technology engineer, Liam contributes to the development of cutting-edge technologies that drive Elexion Automotive's innovation and growth in the electric vehicle space.
persona.name: Liam Chen
persona.responsibilities: Assist in the development and testing of new electric vehicle technologies, including advanced driver-assistance systems and vehicle-to-grid charging.
